subject: Bicycles and Bicycling
Tour de France (Bicycle Race)
lead_paragraph: Alejandro Valverde of Spain won the Dauphiné Libéré on Sunday, putting him among the favorites for next month’s Tour de France.
snippet: Alejandro Valverde of Spain won the Dauphiné Libéré on Sunday, putting him among the favorites for next month’s Tour de France.
